name: Игра забытых Богов. Проснись / Game of the forgotten Gods. Wake up
detailed_description:
The game of forgotten gods. Wake up is a dynamic action game, sword fighting, magic tricks, and an exciting adventure deep into the mysteries of the world, which are protected by invisible force. The plot is based on information that bright people could get and analyze. The player will have to figure out the methods of managing people to help them. But it will be hard, because the acting gods are not going to simply leave and give up power. You will have to fight with their governors in this world, going through an exciting journey to find out the truth and tell it to the people. Install the game, and get the truth for yourself and others!

What to Expect From A Game


  • Dynamic Action From Third Person Controller
  • difficulty in controlling the character will complicate the game and make it more interesting
  • a huge number of people turned into zombies for their bad habits
  • Kombo Beats And Magical Techniques
  • getting knowledge through the implemented in the game TV, radio and book sources
  • Through the radio you will find out what happened to the world
  • Fire books, which describe the instructions for life, go to them and read them using the R key. After reading the book, you can move on
  • books - instructions are guarded by zombies that you need to fight with
  • To defeat the zombies, use combo strikes and magic tricks
  • in some levels there are teleports, use the T key to move between scenes

short_description: The game of forgotten gods. Wake up is a dynamic action game, sword fighting, magic tricks, and an exciting adventure deep into the mysteries of the world, which are protected by invisible force.
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Traditional Chinese, Russian*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista or 7
  • Processor: Core 2 duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or better
  • Storage: 23 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.9+
  • Processor: Core 2 duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or better

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04+
  • Processor: Core 2 duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or better
